dtliExcerpt: Mirren's virtuosic performance as Elizabeth II is reason enough to see this handsomely mounted revival, even if the play itself feels more like an extended acting exercise than a fully formed drama.
bwwExcerpt: Morgan's take on the Queen in these fictionalized meetings is daubed in skewed sentiment, but Mirren sells it with impeccable finesse. The playwright finds poignancy in his protagonist's indebtedness to Major for guiding her through the public's growing distance from the monarchy, as well as in her understated but evident affection for Wilson, who starts their association on the defensive but forges a relaxed camaraderie as he shares his self-doubts. McCabe and Baker take full advantage of playing the most fully drawn of the PM characters, giving relatable performances that provide an entertaining counterpoint to Mirren's poise.
showScoreExcerpt: Mirren's virtuosic performance as Elizabeth II is reason enough to see this handsomely mounted revival, even if the play itself feels more like an extended acting exercise than a fully formed drama.

wrongFullText:
Zoe Saldana in a blush pink Atelier Versace gown.

Read More Oscars Jewelry: Zoe Saldana Is Wearing A $1 Million Necklace

Zoe Saldana hit the red carpet in a draped custom Atelier Versace pink gown at the 2015 Academy Awards held at the Dolby Theatre on Sunday (Feb. 22) in Hollywood.

Saldana starred in this year’s hit superhero adventure film Guardians of the Galaxy, but that’s not the first time her acting has taken her into outer space. She was the star in the blockbuster, box-office record-breaker Avatar.

Photos: See all of Hollywood’s brightest stars in the 2015 Oscars Red Carpet photo gallery

Saldana is a presenter at this year’s Oscars.

Be sure to watch the 2015 Oscars, hosted by Neil Patrick Harris tonight at 5:30 p.m. PT/8:30 p.m. ET on ABC.
